column1: Uchi////We got the foie candy bar ($6) for dessert
column2: which was accurately described to be a better
column5: I found the Austin location to just slightly edge out the Houston location in overall experience
column6: and I will be updating my review of the original to 5 stars to reflect a more accurate relative rating. Uchi Houston is very similar to its older brother in Austin
column7: and while they would never be mistaken for twins
column8: they both still have that same charm that makes them special in the first place. 4 stars.
